High Tech Notebooks

High Tech Notebooks — Moleskine has partnered with Adobe to bring some neat paper-to-digital technology to the note taking process. However, this is where I find myself leaning evermore towards Field Notes; where a notebook is never anything more or less.

Enjoy your day.
